title: Block reacing heigh h0 after collision

content.question: Which of the following quantities is the same immediately after the collision and at the instant the block reaches height <math alttext="h sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>h</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: Linear momentum of the clay-block system
Angular momentum of the clay-block system about the top of the string
Total mechanical energy of the clay-block system
Total mechanical energy of the clay-block-Earth system

content.answer: Total mechanical energy of the clay-block-Earth system
